name: can't survive
description:
Can't survive is an action game, you need to survive the zombies in different maps, while updating your weapons and turrets. Level up to an unlimited level and unlock all the skills to exterminate all the zombies.

how to play:

  • WASD to move.
  • Right click to build turrets and upgrade them, and buy ally from phone.
  • Left click to shoot.
  • Numbers to choose weapon.
  • Esc to open menu.
  • When green light is in top left corner, you have skillpoints to spend.

 and thats it! have fun :)

JUST A DEMO!
